trans-unit.source: This is the general development fund intended to cover costs related to Betoken‚Äôs development. While the team may not have visibility on every particular need that will arise, all donated funds will be used towards Betoken‚Äôs technical development and new security audits.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the vast majority of blockchain projects, Betoken's development is not motivated by greed for either its developers or early adopters. As a measure of this, the project has pledged that:
trans-unit.target: Diferentemente da grande maioria dos projetos de blockchain, o desenvolvimento de Betoken n√£o √© motivado pela gan√¢ncia de seus desenvolvedores ou de seus primeiros usu√°rios. Como medida disso, o projeto promete que:

trans-unit.source: Betoken will not engage in an ICO.
trans-unit.target: Betoken n√£o participar√° de uma ICO.

trans-unit.source: Betoken's launch will be pre-announced, open, and fair. There will be no pre-minted coins or any other funny business. The only avantage of the early users are for those who participate as beta tester of our Rinkeby Testnet app. They'll be able to redeem their testnet Kairo tokens on Mainnet.
trans-unit.target: O lan√ßamento de Betoken ser√° pr√©-anunciado, aberto e justo. N√£o haver√° moedas pr√©-existentes ou qualquer outra bobeira. A √∫nica vantagem dos usu√°rios iniciais √© para aqueles que participam como testador beta do nosso aplicativo Rinkeby Testnet. Eles poder√£o resgatar seus tokens Kairo da testnet na Mainnet.

trans-unit.source: In order to providing funding for its maintenance and future development on Mainnet, Betoken will mint Betoken Shares and send them to the current development team. The amount will be equal to 0.1% of the current Betoken Shares total supply, and it will occur at the end of every investment cycle.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer financiamento para sua manuten√ß√£o e desenvolvimento futuro na Mainnet, Betoken criar√° tokens de Compartilhamento e os enviar√° para a atual equipe de desenvolvimento. O valor ser√° igual a 0,1% da oferta total atual dos tokens de Compartilhamento Betoken e ocorrer√° no final de cada ciclo de investimento.

trans-unit.source: Betoken developers will not seek or accept any capital that comes with the expectation of future monetary return.

trans-unit.source: Betoken will not seek or accept any capital that comes with the expectation of being able to unduly influence Betoken‚Äôs decision-making process.

trans-unit.source: Thus far, Betoken‚Äôs development has been mostly a part-time effort, with
trans-unit.target: At√© agora, o desenvolvimento de Betoken tem sido principalmente um esfor√ßo de meio per√≠odo, com

trans-unit.source: contributing their code, design, ideas on an ad-hoc basis. This will continue in any event, but the reality is that a project of Betoken‚Äôs scope would be greatly helped by having a source of funding. This would allow Betoken to reach its potential more quickly, more reliably, with better supporting infrastructure, and with a far greater chance of success competing against (or co-existing with) well-funded blockchain projects.
trans-unit.target: contribuindo com seu c√≥digo, design e id√©ias em uma base ad-hoc. Isso continuar√° de qualquer forma, mas a realidade √© que em um projeto desse escopo, seria de muita ajuda ter uma fonte de financiamento. Isso permitiria que Betoken atingisse seu potencial mais rapidamente, de forma mais confi√°vel, com melhor infraestrutura de suporte e com uma chance muito maior de sucesso competindo contra (ou coexistindo com) projetos de blockchain bem financiados.

trans-unit.source: To keep Betoken open and free from controlling influences, the project will attempt to rely 100% on community donations for its funding needs. We ask any person, corporate entity or institution who sees potential in Betoken protocol to consider donating to the project, and we hope that the vibrant cryptocurrency community will help Betoken in achieving its goal of providing an open-source, community-owned, permissionless, and censorship-resistant that truly belongs to everyone.

trans-unit.source: Betoken enables capital connection and managing using smart contracts which are open source. Betoken does not take custody of tokens and is only a collaborative hub for investors and managers. Betoken is not a licensed bank, broker-dealer, investment advisor or an exchange.
